tool_description: Creates customs declaration forms including CN22, CN23, and commercial invoices with proper item descriptions and valuations for international shipments.

form_type.description: Type of customs form (CN22, CN23, commercial_invoice)

sender_name.description: Sender's full name or company name

recipient_name.description: Recipient's full name or company name

destination_country.description: Two-letter ISO country code for destination

shipment_purpose.description: Purpose of shipment (gift, commercial_sale, personal_use, return, sample)

item_quantities.description: Array of item quantities corresponding to descriptions

item_values.description: Array of individual item values in USD

item_weights.description: Array of individual item weights in pounds

hs_codes.description: Array of HS codes for each item

currency.description: Currency code for values (USD, EUR, GBP, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid form type: Use one of [CN22, CN23, commercial_invoice].
Mismatched array lengths: All item arrays (descriptions, quantities, values, weights) must have the same length.
Invalid shipment purpose: Use one of [gift, commercial_sale, personal_use, return, sample].
Value threshold exceeded: CN22 forms cannot exceed $400 total value, use CN23 for higher values.
Missing required information: All sender and recipient details must be complete.
Invalid country code: Provide a valid two-letter ISO country code for destination.
Item limit exceeded: Maximum 50 items allowed per declaration.
usage: Specify form_type, complete sender/recipient information, destination_country, and shipment_purpose. Provide matching arrays of item details (descriptions, quantities, values, weights). Optionally include hs_codes, currency, and insurance_amount.

form_data.description: Complete customs form in specified format

total_declared_value.description: Total declared value of all items

form_validity.description: Whether the form meets customs requirements
